trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating"> </xref> i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated"> </xref> zdarzenia <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ObjectDataSourceEventArgs jest używana w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>metody w celu zapewnienia dostępu do wystąpienia obiektu biznesowe przed żadnych operacji danych, które korzystają z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroli i business obiektu są wykonywane.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is set and accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt biznesowy ustawiono i uzyskać dostęp przy użyciu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating> event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> performing the instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Dodając obiektu delegowanego obsługi zdarzeń do obsługi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>zdarzeń, można utworzyć wystąpienia obiektu biznesowego w trybie niestandardowym zamiast <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>wykonywania wystąpienia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with.
trans-unit.target: Jest to przydatne, jeśli chcesz z systemem innym niż domyślne wystąpienie obiektu biznesowych lub wywołać konstruktora z systemem innym niż domyślny się utworzenie wystąpienia; <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>zawsze wywołania konstruktora domyślnego do utworzenia wystąpienia obiektu biznesowego współpracuje.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work.
trans-unit.target: Możesz także dodać obiektu delegowanego obsługi zdarzeń do obsługi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>zdarzeń, dzięki czemu można uzyskać dostępu do żadnego publicznie udostępniane członkom powiązania obiektu biznesowego wykonywać żadnych dodatkowych inicjowania lub pracy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods are not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>metody nie jest wywoływany przez <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrolki, jeżeli jest metoda obiektu biznesowych, który wykonuje operacje na danych `static`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroli udostępnia wiele zdarzeń, które może obsłużyć do pracy z podstawowej obiektu biznesowego w różnym czasie, w jego cyklu życia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: W poniższej tabeli wymieniono zdarzenia i skojarzone <xref:System.EventArgs>klasy i delegaci programu obsługi zdarzeń.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Zdarzenia | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|ObjectDataSourceEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje bezpośrednio przed tworzenia wystąpienia obiektu biznesowego. | ObjectDataSourceEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|ObjectDataSourceEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje, natychmiast po utworzeniu wystąpienia obiektu biznesowego. | ObjectDataSourceEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje przed pobraniem danych. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Wystąpić przed insert, update lub operacja usuwania jest wykonywane. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje po pobraniu danych. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje po wstawieniu, zostało zakończone, operacji aktualizowania lub usuwania. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Występuje przed obiektu biznesowego. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref> przy użyciu określonego obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Obiektu biznesowego, z którym <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> wchodzi w interakcję w celu wykonania operacji na danych.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia obiekt reprezentujący obiektu biznesowego, z którym <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kontroli wykonuje operacje na danych.

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to perform data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt biznesowy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> używane do wykonywania operacji danych; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, jeśli <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> jest przekazywana do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>.
